method.name: get_performance_metrics_counter_paths
method.description: Returns a [code]PackedStringArray[/code] of counter paths that may be passed to [method query_performance_metrics_counter].

method.name: is_capturing_performance_metrics
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the performance metrics system is currently capturing data; otherwise [code]false[/code].

method.name: is_enabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the extension is enabled; otherwise [code]false[/code].

method.name: query_performance_metrics_counter
method.description: Returns a [Dictionary] containing the following keys: - [code]counter_path[/code] ([String]): the counter path associated with this data. - [code]counter_flags[/code] ([int]): a bitfield of [enum PerformanceMetricsCounterFlags] indicating both if this data is valid and what data fields are valid. - [code]counter_unit[/code] ([enum PerformanceMetricsCounterUnit]): The unit associated with the data value. - [code]uint_value[/code] ([int]): The counter value in unsigned integer format. Valid if [code]counter_flags[/code] contains [constant PERFORMANCE_METRICS_COUNTER_FLAGS_UINT_VALUE_VALID_BIT]. - [code]float_value[/code] ([float]): The counter value in floating point format. Valid if [code]counter_flags[/code] contains [constant PERFORMANCE_METRICS_COUNTER_FLAGS_FLOAT_VALUE_VALID_BIT]. The returned [Dictionary] may be empty if an invalid counter path is provided, or if the returned data is not considered valid by the runtime.

method.name: set_capture_performance_metrics
method.description: Sets the performance metrics system as actively capturing or not.
